message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our flagship product to you. It's a game-changer in its field and offers unparalleled value. Given its significance, we're offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950000. This is a special opportunity tailored just for you, considering the immense value this product holds for you personally.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $850000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. While we understand your position, we believe there's still room for negotiation. We're willing to consider $900000 as the new offer price for our product. We hope this aligns better with your budget while still reflecting the value we place on this unique opportunity.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Based on my budget constraints, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $875000.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. We appreciate your efforts to find common ground. Considering the value proposition of our product, we are willing to consider $925000 as the new offer price. We believe this reflects a fair compromise between our interests.
I understand your position, Alice. I would like to counter with an offer of $890000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. After careful consideration, we are willing to negotiate further. We propose an offer of $910000 for our product. We hope this aligns better with your financial considerations while still reflecting the value we believe in.
Thank you for your continued flexibility, Alice. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $895000.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. We appreciate your persistence. In light of your offer, we are willing to consider $905000 as the final offer price for our product. We believe this strikes a balance between our interests and your budget constraints.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate your effort to reach a compromise. I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $897500.
